Related to Unrelenting Standards and Defectiveness. Punishing ones self for not living up to impossible standards or for being broken - ie, being bad. Unable to forgive mistakes and believe that they deserve punishment. Can be self-directed or directed at others.
Treatment: Question person's intentions first before deciding on either doing punishment or forgiveness. Work on practicing self-forgiveness and then extend it to others in a similar way. Do not let taking responsibility for one\'s actions derail attempts of forgiveness.
